options.text: This Azure Sentinel Solution installs analytic rules for Illusive Active Defense that you can enable for custom alert generation in Azure Sentinel. These analytic rules will be deployed in disabled mode in the analytics rules gallery of your Azure Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable these rules in the analytic rules gallery after this Solution deploys.

Create a Sentinel incident upon a new Illusive alert (incident) and associate all related Illusive events to the relevant Sentinel alert. This is done by filtering and processing Illusive Syslog messages.
